snort.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to breathe air in a noisy way out through your nose, especially to show that you are annoyed or amused
snort.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The horse snorted and stamped its hoof impatiently.
snort.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to take drugs by breathing them in through your nose
snort.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a loud sound made by breathing out through your nose, especially to show that you are annoyed or amused
snort.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: There were snorts of laughter from the audience.
snort.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a small amount of a drug that is breathed in through the nose
